DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to learn the effects of a test drug on heart rhythm, and to provide additional data to see if the test drug is well tolerated and safe.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating GAP-486 in Heart Rhythm
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing an electrophysiology study for evaluation of heart rhythm. Patients with uncontrolled blood pressure Patients with certain cardiac risk factors Patients with significant kidney or liver problems
